uint16_t crc_compute (uint8_t *buf, uint16_t size)

Detailed Description

Calculate the CRC-16 CCITT of buffer that is size bytes long.

Parameters:
buf Pointer to data buffer.
size number of bytes in data buffer
Returns:
CRC-16 of buffer[0 .. length]
